string.value: The keeper of the #bAquarium#k, #b#p2060005##k, is researching a way to tame and possibly ride monsters. I should take a trip to Aqua Road and see if there's anything I can do to help!

#p2060005# found out that someone is trying to steal his research. #p2060005# asked me to #b watch the wild boar#k and bring back #b#t4031508##k to him. On top of that, he asked me to get the wild boar's #b#t4031507##k as well...I'd better stay alert for this one--I don't want someone to steal his research before I learn how to tame and ride monsters! 

#i4031508##t4031508# #b#c4031508#/5#k
#i4031507##t4031507# #b#c4031507#/5#k.

I obtained the items and returned to the Aquarium. For helping him with his research, #p2060005# gave me the #bmonster riding skill#k and one #b#t1912000##k for the monster. It's time to travel in style! I must look in the Tiger Ridge map, there should be some rubble lying about--a hidden portal. Traveling through it will transport me to a new area with the pigs. I can use the perfume when I'm close to one to capture it. After that, I can equip the Mount and the saddle, and use my new Monster Riding skill to call the mount! I can feed my pet by visiting the Leafre Pet Food Seller, and make it stronger. Hmm...I wonder if there's a way to get a stronger mount? I'd have to be ready for the 4th Job advancement, I'll bet..
Maybe if I squeeze him in like...Darn...what should I do? I can't put Oinkers into the store house. He is way too fat...Hey! You look like a strong adventurer. Can you help me?

Yes? Thank you very much. My name is #p2060005# and I'm a monster tamer. I look after monsters and study how we can both exist peacefully in the Maple World. I want to prove that monsters can live with humans, if they don't attack them of course. That's why I show people tamed monsters. They're actually quite friendly once tamed. The tricky part is just getting them not to bite off your hand, which can be difficult, I admit.

But people just don't like to look at them, and my work wasn't having the impact I wanted. So, I researched another way for others to view monsters as tamable creatures--by riding them. What do you think? I hope it will work!

My studies are nearly finished. When I finish with #t4031507#, humans can travel simply by riding monsters. However, a few days ago, these weird, yet fascinating creatures broke into my home and learned of my research! I fear what may happen if the secret gets into the wrong hands--this is not for power but for peaceful coexistence of humans and monsters. I fear that if they find my lab and then my notes, they might turn the monsters even more vicious!
So would you help me? I want you to protect Oinkers and gather #b5 #t4031507##k. Don't forget to find #b5 #t4031508##k too. Thanks--I will see that you are rewarded for your help!
You must be busy. It's ok. I'll just have to find another person to help me...
Wow! You protected Oinkers! On top of that, you brought #t4031507# and #t4031508#! Wonderful! You are a real adventurer! Thank you for helping me with this.

I would like to reward you my friend, you have helped to spread the word about humans and monsters coexisting! I'll give you the knowledge of #bMonster Riding#k and #b#t1912000##k which you'll need to ride them. When I finish with the #t4031507#, you can get on the monster and ride him!
Soon I'll finish with #t4031507#, please come to me if you want to use ride monsters, and help show people that both human and monster can co-exist and work together!

You haven't protected Oinkers from attackers--no wonder he doesn't have a scratch on him! Remember, I'll need #b5 #t4031507##k and #b5 #t4031508##k. We can't have anything missing! Please bring back everything back to me!
